name: africa
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nomad_list_cities.
Tool description: Explore best cities to live for digital nomads! Sort by internet speed, cost of living and more! Filter by continents
API description: Get African cities sorted by overall score by default.

Pagination: size & page 
sort_by: you can sort by any numeric value like fore example internet_speed, temperatureC, cost_for_family_in_usd and so on.
sort: asc | desc

sort.description: Sort order, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Defaults to 'desc'.

sort_by.description: The attribute to sort by, such as 'overall_score', 'internet_speed', 'temperatureC', 'cost_for_family_in_usd', etc. Defaults to 'overall_score'.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to '1'.

size.description: Number of results per page. Defaults to '20'.
